edu.uci.isr.impromptu.pocketpc
Class TinyImpromptu

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.isr.impromptu.pocketpc.TinyImpromptu
public class TinyImpromptu
extends java.lang.Object

This is the main applicatio class. It basically reads command line inputs, starts local Yancees server instance, if necessaary, and initializes the applicatio GUI.

Author:
rsilvafi class created at Aug 15, 2005
